text: High Noon is a 1952 American western movie directed by Fred Zinnemann and starring Gary Cooper, Thomas Mitchell, Grace Kelly, Lloyd Bridges, Otto Kruger, Lon Chaney Jr., Harry Morgan, Katy Jurado, Lee Van Cleef. It was distributed by United Artists and was nominated for 7 Oscars and won 4 Academy Awards in 1953. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1952 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Fred Zinnemann
title: High Noon
